wired.title: The UK Just Made Itself a Fantastic Place to Test Self-Driving Cars
wired.topComment: I want to see video of two autonomous cars driving down a near-single lane road in the english countryside and see how well they react. Car tech is only part of the problem. Assumptions about what constitutes a road and courtesy versus legality could...

wired.title: Software That Turns Your Lego Masterpiece Into a Digital Building
wired.topComment: I'm no architect or designer, but that's something I wouldn't mind playing with!
